price: 47. Nabiyow! Nanu koros koo ankacissa waqdi, koo kah ankacissam anqas kee bura kinnim naaxigeh, usun ku caagidih garaan waqdiy atu Qhuraan takriye koroosite mari isin kalalı katattaanam mantun elle baaben numuy kas edde yengeyye akke waytek sittak iyyan waqdi naaxigeh.
arabic: نَّحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَسۡتَمِعُونَ بِهِۦٓ إِذۡ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِذۡ هُمۡ نَجۡوَىٰٓ إِذۡ يَقُولُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ إِن تَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُلٗا مَّسۡحُورًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: naḥnu aʿlamu bimā yastamiʿūna bihi idh yastamiʿūna ilayka wa-idh hum najwā idh yaqūlu al-ẓālimūna in tattabiʿūna illā rajulan masḥūran
